Key Arguments: The legislation will further destroy free speech and prevent the discovery of truth.
The Australian government is already exercising censorship through initiatives like the 'Trusted News Initiative'.
Social media platforms are already censoring content through 'fact-checking' algorithms, supported by government cooperation.
The presence of 'RMIT Fact Checkers' on Facebook is evidence of government control over social media narratives.
Government censorship has prevented public discussion on issues like the effectiveness and safety of COVID-19 vaccinations and the complexities of the Ukraine war.
Main Themes: Criticism of government foreign policy, particularly regarding the Ukraine war
Notable Quotes: The proposed government changes will further destroy free speech and prevent the discovery of TRUTH.
The Australian government is already exercising censorship of mainstream news services via the ‘Trusted News Initiative’.
Examples of where Australian government censorship has recently prevented the discovery of TRUTH.
